import { useState } from "react" export default function QuestionForm(){ const initialFormState = { question: "", answer_a: "", answer_b: "", answer_c: "", answer_d: "", correct: "", } const [formData, setFormData] = useState({...initialFormState}) const handleChange= (e) =>{ let stateValue = e.target.value; setFormData({...formData, [e.target.name]:stateValue}); } return(
{ second }, [third], )} />
